alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:23PM MDT until July 03 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...EASTERN LAWRENCE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 322 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piedmont, or 12 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Summerset around 330 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Black Hawk and northwestern Rapid City. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 41 and 58. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
